div.p: Parents and Students,USD #337 will be using this web link to provide information regarding our continuous learning plan for students. We will continue to update this link with information, so...

Congratulations to the 2020-2021 RVHS Drumline!

Juniors
Parker...
Senior Cassidy Parks has been selected for the Dale Dennis Excellence in Education award! Congratulations, Cassidy!
Congratulations to Mrs. Swtizky and the yearbook staff. The Royal Valley 2019 yearbook was designated an Honorable Mention for Balfour’s 34th edition of The Yearbook Yearbook.

Madison Saia is April's Senior of the Month. She participated in volleyball 4 years & a starter on the 2019 state championship team. She also played softball for four years. She was a member of JCYC, FFA, and STUCO during her high school career
Congratulations to Senior Hadley Gregory! She was chosen for a 2020 Governor’s Scholar Award, which is given to the top 1% of high school seniors!

Continuous learning: Spanish III students listened to descriptions and drew people and scenes based on this week’s lesson, then the class collaborated to invent additional details in Spanish about the scene.
